title: RuntimeError: Function not implemented at /pytorch/torch/lib/THD/process_group/General.cpp:17
body_html:
i find some problem, the same code and same env. some machine my code can work,but some machine have some error as follow:

dist.init_process_group('nccl', world_size=world_size, init_method='file://shared_distributed')

File "/home/.pyenv/versions/3.6.6/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/distributed/init.py", line 94, in init_process_group
group_name, rank)
RuntimeError: Function not implemented at /pytorch/torch/lib/THD/process_group/General.cpp:17

  • PyTorch :
    installed PyTorch by ,pip
  • OS:
    linux
  • PyTorch version:
    0.4.0
  • Python version:
    3.6.6
  • CUDA/cuDNN version:
    cuda/9.0 4) nccl/2.1.15-cuda9.0
  • GPU models and configuration:
    NVIDIA-SMI 390.67 Driver Version: 390.67
    Tesla K40m

body:
i find some problem, the same code and same env.  some machine my code can work,but some machine have some error as follow:

    dist.init_process_group('nccl', world_size=world_size, init_method='file://shared_distributed')
  File "/home/.pyenv/versions/3.6.6/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/distributed/__init__.py", line 94, in init_process_group
    group_name, rank)
RuntimeError: Function not implemented at /pytorch/torch/lib/THD/process_group/General.cpp:17


- PyTorch :
 installed PyTorch by ,pip
- OS:
linux
- PyTorch version:
0.4.0
- Python version:
3.6.6
- CUDA/cuDNN version:
cuda/9.0              4) nccl/2.1.15-cuda9.0
- GPU models and configuration:
NVIDIA-SMI 390.67                 Driver Version: 390.67
Tesla K40m
